content: fall in love with autumn this september with this new crochet along find the pattern free to download on the hobbycraft ideas hub each friday from 22nd september for 7 weeks i ve included lots of different stitches and techniques for you to explore to create a blanket adorned with lots of autumnal favourites berries acorns pumpkins toadstools and more please see the hobbycraft website for more information or follow me on instagram @the_burrow_uk i had so much fun designing this and cannot wait to go on this autumnal journey with you all
